title: AI leaders warn Congress AI could be used to create bioweapons
description: Two AI researchers and the CEO of AI startup Anthropic testified about the long-term risks of AI and said Congress needs to institute rules to control it.

title: NASA funds moon projects to help missions to ‘live off the land’
description: The space agency awarded contracts to develop technologies that would build habitats and power sources on the lunar surface as part of its Artemis program.

title: Tired of proving you’re not a robot? Say goodbye to Captcha boxes.
description: Tired of diabolical puzzles to prove you're a human? Technology may finally kill the hated Captcha.
